dict.acceptation: 合适的，适当的，适宜的，恰当的；

sent.orig: Suitable for multi cookie type etc pattet-free assemble big size combination package, suitable for any shape.
sent.trans: 适用于多枚饼干类物品的无需用托盒的集合大包装袋，方、圆、椭圆等各种形状皆可。

sent.orig: Though not suitable for making steamed stuffed buns, stiff dough is suitable for making shaved noodles.
sent.trans: 硬面虽然不适合包饺子，却适合做刀削面。

sent.orig: Suitable for pipe and cable wiring. Suitable for GB12476, IEC61241 standard request.
sent.trans: 钢管或电缆布线均可。符合GB12476，IEC61241标准要求。

sent.orig: It is suitable for the mixing of breeding fodder, especially suitable for eel farming.
sent.trans: 本产品适用于养殖类的饲料搅拌，特别适用于养鳗作业。

sent.orig: Grape production of the soil, sun, climate, resources are suitable for grape growing.
sent.trans: 葡萄产地的土质、阳光、气候、水源都适宜葡萄的生长。
